Fall Rush 2019

Our Chapter

We are a chapter founded on __, __, and __. Pi Kappa Phi is the newest chapter to join greek life at Northeastern. We established our charter in the Spring of 2019, and have been working hard to establish foundational values and practices that will leave our chapter as one of the best in the Greek community.
